amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute extended coverage of the bill to other public lands. See pages H10589-H10594 in the Congressional Record of October 12, 1998 or further description.
amendment.purpose: Amendment in the nature of a substitute.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Hansen.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hansen amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
